attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The undersigned deplore the arrest of a front bench oppostion Shadow Minister Damian Green MP. We petition the Prime Minister to dissolve parliament and ask the people to either support him or deport him.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
